string.value: I heard something happened in Leafre. I'd better go talk to Pam.

Apparently something did happen at Leafre. I asked Pam what's up, and the concern was that the Hafrings living at the town ran into Kentauruses at the forest and were badly injured. To heal those Hafrings will require a medicine, and the #bChief Tatamo#k mentioned that #b80 #t4000241##k are required to make the medicine. I'll have to gather up #b80 #t4000241##k now for the wounded Hafrings.\n\n#i4000241##t4000241# #b#c4000241##k / 80
After hearing from Pam that in order to cure the Hafrings that are wounded by Kentaurus, I'll need to gather up some grass chewed by Birks, I was able to do exactly that and gave them all to Pam.
정말 걱정이에요. 얼마전에 숲에 갔던 어른들이 켄타우로스들의 영역싸움에 휘말리는 바람에 다쳐서 돌아왔대요. 요즘 미나르숲 깊은 곳에 사는 켄타우로스들이 사이가 안 좋아졌다고 하던데... 정말 큰일이에요.
촌장님이 그러시는데 버크가 씹던 풀이 있어야 치료약을 만들 수 있다고 하시더라구요. 하지만 우리 하프링들은 싸움을 싫어해서 버크 근처에도 갈 수가 없어요. 우리 마을 사람들을 위해서 #b#t4000241# 80개#k를 모아와 주시지 않겠어요?
정말요? 우와~ 감사합니다. #b#t4000241# 80개#k를 모아서 가져 오시면 되요. 꼭 좀 부탁드릴게요~
마을 어른들이 많이 다쳐서 정말 큰일이에요. 어서 빨리 치료약을 만들어야 할텐데...

Oh, no, our town is in deep trouble. Okay, this is what happened. A number of hafrings went into the forest, but they all later came out hurt because they were caught in the middle of a battle between the Kentauruses. I heard that the Kentauruses have lately been fighting against each other deep in the Minar Forest. This is really scary...

According to the town chief, #bChief Tatamo#k, the only medicine available for the Hafrings that are hurt will have to be a medicine made from grass that's been chewed up by Birks. The problem is, we the Hafrings don't like to fight, so I can't even imagine going near them. Can you please help us out and gather up #b80 #t4000241##k for us?
Really? Yay! Thank you so much! All you need to do is gather up #b80 #t4000241##k and bring them back here. I'll be here waiting~!
I am worried that so many hafrings have been hurt by this. We need the medicine as soon as possible!
Oh wow, did you get them all? This should be enough for the chief to make the medicine. Thank you so so much!
Seriously, thanks a lot for your help. All the Hafrings in this town will be thankful for your work. Please come visit us often! I think you are the kind of person I can trust!
We'll need #b80 #t4000241##k to take care of the Hafrings that are injured.
